name: necon1abii
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), w0)
-| wb(w0, wn(wn(w0)))
-| wb(wn(wn(w0)), wne(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), w0)
-| wb(w0, wn(wn(w0)))
-| wb(wn(wn(w0)), wne(c0, c1))

|- wb(wne(c0, c1), w0)
-| wb(wn(wn(w0)), wne(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wn(w0)), wne(c0, c1))
-| wb(wn(w0), wceq(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), w0)
-| wb(wn(w0), wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Contrapositive inference for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Nov-2019.)
